content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for showing interest in my apartment in Mannheim. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month.

I am a student and I am looking for a budget-friendly option. I am also dependable and responsible, so I believe that I can maintain the apartment well. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I would like to propose a fair rental price that works for both of us.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Ryanah. While 500 Euros per month may be a reasonable rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim, I would like to clarify a few things before we can come to an agreement.

Firstly, could you please provide me with some information about your financial situation and any other expenses you may have, such as tuition fees, transportation costs, and any other charges that you will be incurring during your stay in Mannheim? This will help me understand your ability to pay the rental price and whether it is a fair and reasonable amount for you.

Secondly, I would like to know more about your experience as a tenant and your level of responsibility in terms of maintaining the apartment and keeping it clean and tidy. This will help me assess your suitability as a tenant and whether you will be able to meet my expectations as a landlord.

Once we have a clearer understanding of each other's financial situations and responsibilities, we can discuss the rental price and come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student who will be studying at the University of Mannheim. I will be living in the apartment for at least one year. My monthly expenses will include tuition fees, transportation costs, and any other charges that I may incur during my stay in Mannheim. I am a responsible person and I will make sure to keep the apartment clean and tidy. I am willing to negotiate the rental price based on my financial situation and your expectations as a landlord.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Ryanah. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to accept your proposed rental price of 500 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate the rental price based on your financial situation and my expectations as a landlord. I believe that this is a fair and reasonable rental price for the apartment, and I am confident that you will be able to meet your responsibilities as a tenant and maintain the apartment in good condition.

I look forward to renting the apartment to you and welcome you to Mannheim. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
